title: Explore Garland | Garland, TX
text: - Home - Explore Garland Create a Website Account - Manage notification subscriptions, save form progress and more. Garland is a culturally diverse city with rich history, urban appeal, natural resources and pure Texas charisma. Allow your imagination to lead you to some of the best Texas shopping, a rich arts scene, idyllic outdoor recreation and a full slate of special events. Garland has an adventure made for you.
